arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} You have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]%{/c} chance to launch {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage and Stun enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
